Services & Pricing

Senior SEO leadership and AI systems for companies past the agency stage. Transparent pricing. Documented methodology. Limited availability.

Flagship

Fractional SEO Leadership

$8,000/month

10 hours monthly of senior strategic oversight embedded in your marketing team. I function as your SEO director without the full-time salary, benefits, and management overhead. 6-month minimum commitment.

What's included

  • ✓ Monthly strategic session (90 min, recorded)
  • ✓ Async Slack/email access (48hr SLA)
  • ✓ Implementation oversight and priority review
  • ✓ Quarterly deep-dive audit with roadmap update
  • ✓ Information architecture and internal linking strategy
  • ✓ Content production system design
  • ✓ Monthly transparency report (what 10 hours bought)

Ideal for

  • Mid-market B2B ($5M-$50M revenue)
  • In-house marketing team, no senior SEO
  • Post-agency, need implementation partner
  • SaaS, professional services, manufacturing

Availability

3 of 5 slots open

Request Discovery Call

AI Knowledge Systems

$5,000 one-time

Custom AI memory architecture for your team. Context files, workflow automation, persistent knowledge bases that survive session boundaries. Your AI stops forgetting everything between conversations.

Deliverables

  • ✓ Knowledge architecture audit and design
  • ✓ Custom context file system for your workflows
  • ✓ Team training session (recorded, 2 hours)
  • ✓ Documentation for ongoing maintenance
  • ✓ 30-day follow-up support

Ideal for

  • Teams using ChatGPT/Claude without structure
  • Content teams re-explaining context every session
  • Operations wanting AI-native workflows
Get Started

SEO-Native Site Builds

From $5,000

Static sites engineered for topical authority from the first deployment. Information architecture, entity markup, internal linking systems, structured data. Built to compound organic traffic, not just look good.

Deliverables

  • ✓ Topical authority map and content architecture
  • ✓ Static site build (Tailwind + vanilla JS)
  • ✓ Full JSON-LD entity markup
  • ✓ Build pipeline (markdown to HTML automation)
  • ✓ Netlify/Cloudflare deployment
  • ✓ Content production pipeline handoff

Recent builds

  • aifirstsearch.com — 266 pages
  • browserprompt.com — in progress
  • b2bvic.com — this site
Discuss a Build

Strategy Consulting

$200/hour

One-off strategy sessions, second opinions on existing SEO work, audit reviews, or problem diagnosis. No retainer required. Book the time you need, get direct access to senior-level thinking on your specific problem.

Common use cases

  • ✓ Second opinion on agency SEO audit
  • ✓ Traffic drop diagnosis and recovery plan
  • ✓ AI implementation strategy for marketing ops
  • ✓ Site architecture review before migration
  • ✓ Content strategy workshop for in-house teams

Minimum

2-hour minimum per session. Remote via Zoom or Google Meet.

Booking

Typically available within 5 business days.

Book a Session

How this compares

B2B Vic (Fractional) SEO Agency Full-Time Hire
Monthly cost $8,000 $5,000-$15,000 $12,000+ (fully loaded)
Who does the work Senior consultant (me) Junior associates Depends on hire
Commitment 6 months 12+ months typical Indefinite
Methodology Published, documented Proprietary (opaque) Varies
AI integration Production-grade Experimental Self-taught
Scales with you Systems outlive engagement Stops when you stop paying Leaves when they leave

Common questions

Monthly cadence: one 90-minute strategy session with your team, async availability via Slack or email with a 48-hour response SLA, priority review of implementation work, and a quarterly deep-dive audit. Between sessions, I review your analytics, flag issues, and adjust the roadmap. You get a monthly transparency report showing exactly where 10 hours went.
Every deliverable comes from me. Not a junior associate, not an outsourced team. Capping at 5 retainer clients ensures I can maintain execution quality across all engagements. When I'm at capacity, new inquiries join a waitlist. Scarcity is real, not manufactured.
Agencies sell senior talent in the pitch and deliver junior execution. You meet the director during the sales process, then get handed to an account coordinator running 20+ clients. Fractional consulting inverts this: the person you evaluate is the person doing the work. Methodology is documented and published. Pricing is transparent. No account management theater.
Month-to-month after the initial term. The systems I build are designed to outlive the engagement. If your team can run the playbook independently, we wind down. If you want ongoing strategic oversight, we continue. No lock-in, no guilt trips.
Yes. Every framework I use with clients is published in my writing. If a competitor reads it and implements it themselves, that's fine. The value isn't in the playbook. It's in the judgment of when to follow it, when to deviate, and how to sequence actions for your specific situation.

Start a conversation

No pitch decks, no 12-email nurture sequences. Reach out, describe what you need, and I'll tell you honestly whether I can help.

Send an email to:

vic@scalewithsearch.com

Include:

  • Your company and what you do
  • Current SEO situation (in-house, agency, nothing)
  • What you're trying to solve
  • Timeline and budget range

Response time: 24-48 hours, weekdays.
